title: Coordinate a Community Outreach Meeting
description: Before seeking approval for a controversial development project, the developer holds a community meeting to present the project and gather feedback.

tasks.description: Book a local venue and send out notices to neighborhood associations and residents about the meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting is scheduled and the community is notified.

tasks.description: Prepare a presentation with renderings and data that explains the project and its benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and persuasive presentation is created.

tasks.description: During the meeting, present the project, answer questions from residents, and document all feedback and concerns.
tasks.expected_outcome: The developer gathers valuable community feedback to potentially modify the project and build goodwill.
